name: MazeCrawler (xtase studios)
description:
Entry for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2, please rate!

Find your way through the maze and try to get as far as you can.  But be aware you are not alone.

Maze is random generated. Items will be randomly dropped around the maze.

Items

  • Key -> open exit door if needed
  • MazeScanner -> see map
  • Candy -> survive a hit
  • Heart -> gain 1 health
  • Coin -> useless :)

Controls

  • AWSD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Left mouse to open doors and pickup and drop items
  • Shift to run
